title: The Washing machine
brief_description: A hand-drawn 2D computer animation in response to the theme washing machine. A man is spied upon by a mischievous elephant as he walks through the hot summer landscape. The elephant proceeds to have fun with the man by skirting him and rolling him flat on the ground. Intended as a visual play on the physical differences of man and elephant.
